citation: Proclamation under the Police Offences Amendment (Public Drunkenness) Act 2000 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Police Offences Amendment (Public Drunkenness) Act 2000

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Police Offences Amendment (Public Drunkenness) Act 2000 fix 27 March 2002 as the day on which that Act commences.

18 March 2002

G. S. M. GREEN

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

D. E. LLEWELLYN

Minister for Police and Public Safety

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 27 March 2002

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Police and Public Safety.
